name: Boxing Stars Punch 3D
description:
Boxing Stars Punch 3D is real punch boxing combo game with multi fighting experience in single game of wrestling & boxing action. Install this free wrestling and fighting game and acquire all stars wrestling fights & real punch boxing in this realistic fighting simulation game. This game is specially for wrestling & boxing fighting lovers who actually bother about wrestling super stars career challenges.
Feature:
Amazing free & career mode with ultimate boxing bonanza.
5 most dangerous opponent boxers to play against.
Best boxer game for the combat sports lovers
